name: Holiday Inn Key Largo

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I were at the Tiki bar by the pool. One bartender was so extremely rude telling us if we wanted food we must order immediately as she was going off duty, but the bar was still open. I went in and spoke with the duty manager. Then the bartender came out after she was off duty and made a scene at the bar, threw dollar bills at us and was completely out of line. We will never use this hotel again.
reviews.title: Terrible Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am a flight attendant for 25 years and have stayed in a gazillion hotels and found the Holiday Inn-Key Largo, FL to be fine: a good value for the $$-safe, clean, helpful staff, decent bar and food, and a good location.
reviews.title: I found it perfectly fine.
Convenient to diving and snorkeling
reviews.text: With hotels running 250.00 a night plus-this was fine-and I have stayed in enough palaces and dives to know. This was quiet, safe, near all, clean and perfectly workable for a nice little vacation. Recommend.

This hotel is conveniently located in the middle of Key Largo immediately adjacent to the marina. If you're coming for fishing, diving, snorkeling, or anything else involving a boat, this is a great place to stay.
reviews.title: Beautify Grounds Poor condition for room Rude Staff

likes.disliked: — Front staff. Major stains. peeling and cracking paint

reviews.text: Rooms are clean, staff courteous, and the swimming pool area is absolutely fantastic (2 pools + hot tub). Beach towels are available from the front desk, a useful service for later on-water and below-water activities. Free wifi and gym.
reviews.title: Good stopover

reviews.text: My husband and I stayed two nights at this hotel. Pool area and food okay. Hotel staff extemely noisy -- constant yelling. Overall, hotel needs updating. Fan in bathroom non-functioning. Hotel staff needs additional customer service training. Won't re-visit this area. No Shopping --- limited places to eat. Not impressed.
reviews.title: Not Impressed

reviews.text: For where it is the hotel is an 8/10 in anyone's book ....... however cant say the same for some of the staff - they would get a 2/10
reviews.title: Pretty good, but not the best place in the keys by a long way

reviews.text: Liked the feel of the Keys, but cant help thinking you need to go further down - Key Largo appeared just to be hotels, shops and restaurants either side of a busy road without a centre/ focal point
reviews.title: Great Hotel, loved our stay!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If the want a drink there isnt much around that is within walking
reviews.title: Nice Place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Waht a find!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is the most beautiful hotel in Key Largo. The room was spotless, the bed perfectly made and comfortable, the view was outstanding (of the harbor). We had 90 degree weather everyday and spent the afternoons in one of two gorgeous pools. The Tiki Bar bartenders were extremely kind and remembered you everytime you approached. All hotel staff were pleasant and assisted with our questions regarding tours and sites. I recommend taking the Casino Cruise...so much fun, especially the shark visits at night! Take a short drive to Islamorada where you can shop in the best stores, eat at the best restaurants and hang out all day by the water. Then return to the Holiday Inn where you can walk the dock to Sharky's (although they do not like tourists, but their food is very good), or you can have dinner and drinks at Coconuts. I recommend the Grouper entree! All in all, I cannot wait to go back!
reviews.title: Most Beautiful Hotel in Key Largo!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: So my wife and I stayed here on our way down to Key West. Check in was great and so was our room. It was clean and the bed was comfy.
reviews.title: Good overall (beware of the free cruise)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool was amazing. Very well kept and fantastic landscaping. The service at the pool was only so-so. But overall, we were very happy.
reviews.title: Would not stay again or recommend

likes.disliked: — Not near a beach, unfriendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: What we expected...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Comfortable Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is a little tired, but it's a good deal for Key Largo. We stayed here for two nights. Our room could have used some paint, the rug was pretty old, and there were hairs in the bathtub when we got there (although the room was cleaned well after that). The main problem we had was that the sink barely drained. Your room ends up seeming pretty ghetto when you've got standing water in the sink all the time.
reviews.title: Nice pool area - the hotel is a little tired

likes.liked: — Nice pool area and Tiki Bar
likes.disliked: — Sink had draining problems; room was a little old

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel seems to have spent all it's money on the pool and Tiki bar area - this is really nice and a great place to hang out. There were a lot of families there and the kids were having a great time at the two pools. There is also a jacuzzi.
reviews.title: Gem of a Holiday Inn in Key Largo

reviews.text: We had a fairly decent dinner at the hotel restaurant, Bogie's Cafe (there were a ton of mosquitos outdoors at twilight, so we ended up moving inside - but that isn't the hotel's fault).
reviews.title: Good Hotel-Fair Price

likes.liked: — Good location in Key Largo with a clean comfy bed!

reviews.text: We went on a snorkelling trip at John Pennekamp, and the hotel is pretty close, so that was pretty convenient.
reviews.title: Not bad, but could use an update....

likes.disliked: — Older hotel that needs an update, but it is clean.

reviews.title: Good location
reviews.text: This is a good hotel to stay at if you are a pool person and stay around the pool and bar all day. ( It makes sense in Key Largo if you are not renting a boat or fishing or diving.)

description: The Holiday Inn Key Largo Resort is the ideal Florida Keys location for families and individuals looking for an experience worth repeating in a breath taking locale. Absorb yourself in all that we have to offer! Stroll along our marina and paved pathways through lush foliage to find our two heated outdoor pools with Tiki Bar, cascading waterfall, Jacuzzi and spacious pool deck. Sip a tropical cocktail at our Tiki Bar, or savor delicious local fare at Bogie's Cafe and Garden Terrace. With spacious, well appointed rooms overlooking our tropical paradise and marina, the Holiday Inn Key Largo Resort is the perfect place for exploring the many wonders of the Florida Keys. Discover the enchantments of the Coral Reefs when you snorkel or dive. Experience our famous waters aboard the Glass Bottom Boat, on a fishing excursion, or even toast champagne on a sunset cruise. Try your luck on the Casino Boat! Located only 55 minutes from Miami, the Holiday Inn Key Largo is truly a world away. From the moment you arrive, you will know you have reached your destination; Paradise.
